mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE_USER(EMAIL, PASSWORD, NAME, DIVISION) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{division})
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL, PASSWORD, NAME, DIVISION, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), INDATE, 111) as INDATE, TEAMNUMBER FROM SCHEDULE_USER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into SCHEDULE_TEAM(TEAM_SEQUENCE) values(NEXT VALUE FOR tSEQ)
mapper.select: SELECT last_used_value FROM sys.sequences where name='tSEQ'
